title: Initizlize loader only after activity created AND location determined
message:
Initizlize loader only after activity created AND location determined

Need to prevent race condition between activity creation and location determination, so use onActivityCreated  as recommended by the framework as well as onLocationDetermined.

title: Initialize loader mananger in onActivityCreated
message:
Initialize loader mananger in onActivityCreated

Per the framework's recommendation. Luckily for us, the activity was already getting created in time when we were calling this in onCreate, but that's not guaranteed.

message:

title: Switch to street map type by default
message:
Switch to street map type by default

Also, display a toast when the offline map is enabled and user is zoomed too far in or out to see the map tiles. It would be better to have some sort of a floating, static button - perhaps which, when clicked, returned the user to the map area and an acceptable zoom - but we'll leave that for a future feature.

title: Save shares as user preferences, and copy back to the db after upgrade
message:
Save shares as user preferences, and copy back to the db after upgrade

For simplicity, force db upgrades by overwriting and store shares with a JSON object in shared preferences as the canonical source. (Generating upgrade sql was hairy). Copy back to the db on upgrade for fast searching.

title: Fix #18: Results Activity: Crash when switching from Map tab, to List tab, and back again
message:
Fix #18: Results Activity: Crash when switching from Map tab, to List tab, and back again

Thsi was a race condition between map layout and the call to pan/zoom to marker bounds. Do the zoom in another method which waits for marker bounds and layout of map before proceeding. Slight drawback in that the world map at zoom 0 is shown briefly.

Move creation of image loader into onResume and display image after copying to media store

Explicity recycle bitmap we create for the media store, since it's full-resolution and we know when we're done with it. This seems to fix (or go a long way toward fixing) #3.

Caching is hard and we're not doing a great job of it Since we're not even using the disk cache code, and all of our files are on disk anyway, remove disk caching code and thus some complexity.

title: Fix #16: Crash after searching for waterfall by name or hike & switching to Map tab
message:
Fix #16: Crash after searching for waterfall by name or hike & switching to Map tab

Don't bother trying to add the searched-for location to the map, or compare a returned waterfall's distance to it, if it's not a location search (as indicated by a null returned by getOriginAddress - that could be better). Formalize a couple other methods into the OnLocationQueryListener interface.

title: Move downloader client stub connection to buildPendingDownloadIntent
message:
Move downloader client stub connection to buildPendingDownloadIntent

...which is called by the Fragment's onResume(). Can't put it in the Activity's onResume because the client stub isn't created yet there.

title: Some better comments, logging, and formatting for ScaleImageView
message:
Some better comments, logging, and formatting for ScaleImageView

In case we decided to keep using it, which we probably won't.

title: Better handling of images
message:
Better handling of images

Resize images based on some simple parameters relating to screen size. Seems to do a decent job at scaling, although we're not exactly "tablet optimized" here (we'll add side-by-side fragements at some point). Also remove dependency on ScaleImageView for simplicity - this was doing some of the same work as the ImageLoader's scaling during decoding but messing with the ability to use native layout parameters in XML. Probably won't be doing the StaggeredGrid this time around :(

title: More work on search/results plus initial db stuff
message:
More work on search/results plus initial db stuff

Standalone tab listener class. Pattern for fragments to communicate with
parent Activities using a listener interface. Lauch Results activity on
search and pass data in the Intent. Initial work on connecting to
database, first creating it from the existing sqlite file in the assets
folder, using android-sqlite-asset-helper:
https://github.com/jgilfelt/android-sqlite-asset-helper
